MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry Find(string name) cil managed
Public Function Find (name As String) As DirectoryEntry

param.name: name
param.span: 包含要搜索的子对象的名称。

span.span: Contains the name of the child object for which to search.

summary.span: 返回此集合中具有指定名称的成员。

span.span: Returns the member of this collection with the specified name.
A that represents the child object that was found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不同类型的子对象具有相同的名称，则返回第一个匹配的子对象。If child objects of different types have the same name, the first matching child object is returned. > [!NOTE] > Internet Information Services （IIS）提供程序不支持此方法。The Internet Information Services (IIS) provider does not support this method. 使用重载方法，并`schemaClassName`为参数指定一个空字符串（""）。Use the overloaded method and specify an empty string ("") for the `schemaClassName` parameter. > > 如果未找到匹配的结果，则会引发带有错误代码0x2030 的。If no matching result is found, a with error code 0x2030 is thrown.

exception.span: Active Directory 域服务对象不是容器。

span.span: The Active Directory Domain Services object is not a container.
An error occurred during the call to the underlying interface.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SchemaFilter As SchemaNameCollection

summary.span: 获取指定集合包含哪些子对象的架构。

span.span: Gets the schemas that specify which child objects are contained in the collection.

value.span: ，指定 实例中包含哪些子对象。

span.span: A that specifies which child objects are contained in the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性为空，则所有类型的子对象在集合中可见; 否则，只有指定类型的子对象可见。If the property is empty, child objects of all types are visible in the collection; otherwise, only those of the specified types are visible.
